text.div:
Chikungunya Virus Disease (Tests for Chikungunya Virus IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    56130-8 Chikungunya virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
    56131-6 Chikungunya virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
    57934-2 Chikungunya virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    83067-9 Chikungunya virus structural proteins (E1+E2) IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    88629-1 Chikungunya virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
